pullRequest.title: DHFPROD-4167: Add Entity Type
pullRequest.bodyText:
Description
Created a new Modeling route on the Home Menu.
Created bug for identical entity name overwriting an existing entity's properties.
https://project.marklogic.com/jira/browse/DHFPROD-4795
Checklist:
- Note: do not change the below


Owner:


 JIRA_ID included in all the commit messages


 PR title is in the format JIRA_ID:Title


 Rebase the branch with upstream


 Squashed all commits into a single commit


 Added Tests


Reviewer:


 Reviewed Tests

nodes.bodyText: I would like us to avoid writing integration/e2e tests for scenarios that can be covered using RTL. Form validations and table rendering test below can be verified using RTL as unit tests.
I would also like us to avoid using data-testid heavily and use it as a last resort. We can instead use getByTitle, getByLabelText, getByPlaceholderText etc wherever possible.
can replace with placeholderText similar to other input/select fields in the app.
Same as before. Can replace with placeholderText

Is "Add" button disabled in the absence of required field? Can add asserttion for that.
Can add a test to verify form error to test Name is a required field.
Will be good to include tests to update description(and edit entity) here, unless there is a separate story for that.
We can get rid of corresponding cypress integration test since we have this unit test in place, to reduce duplication and run time.

afterCommit.message:
DHFPROD-4167: Add Entity Type

DHFPROD-4167: removed integration tests, disabled add button on entity type add modal

nodes.bodyText: Test is missing assertion for invalid entry.

This is about data-testid again. We seem to be using "Add Entity Type" text for assertion elsewhere. Since that works we can probably get rid of this data-testid? I will leave it up to you @brucean52.
